description:
Everything you need in a versatile touring shoe, with a look that fits in off the bike. Whether you're a daily commuter or taking off on a long bikepacking adventure, these shoes provide sure-footed traction on and off the bike. An integrated shank provides stiffness for efficient pedaling.

  • Paneled mesh upper with TPU overlays is durable and breathes well
  • Speed lacing and instep strap for a locked in fit
  • Fibreglass reinforced EVA provides stiffness for pedaling and comfort when walking
  • Rubber sole grips pedals and pavement
  • Compatible with SPD (2-pole) pedals
name: Shimano MT502 Cycling Shoes - Unisex
